subtasks: Pick up the hay and carry it to the trailer
Place the hay into the trailer

tasks.task: Cut the vines with the machete
subtasks: Grasp the handle of the machete
Swing the machete to cut the vines
Apply the fertilizer to the crops
Separate the grain from the stalks
Clear the area of weeds and debris
Enter the chicken coop or run
Check for sick or injured chickens
Monitor the grain quality and moisture
Attach the plow to the tractor
Guide the tractor along the rows

tasks.task: Plant the seeds with the planter
subtasks: Plant the seeds at the correct depth
Tie the wire to the fence posts
Position the cattle guard over a road
Secure the guard to the ground
Identify the bushes that need cutting
Use a pruning shears or similar tool
Cut the stems at the base
Position the sprinklers or drip lines
Connect the system to the water source
Locate the drain plug or valve
Open the drain to release water
Gather any remaining water with a bucket

tasks.task: Gather eggs from the hen house
subtasks: Close the door and check for safety
Transport the goods to the market
Set up a stall or booth
Disassemble the faucet to find the leak
Assess the site for solar panels
Connect to the inverters and battery
Test the system to ensure power generation
Add new materials to the pile
Inspect the water tank or system
Fill the water tank if necessary
Check water level in water troughs
Identify areas where pests are entering
Remove and dispose of caught pests
Pull or dig out the weeds
Apply paint with a brush or roller
Allow the paint to dry and add another coat if needed

tasks.task: Compact the soil with the roller
subtasks: Attach the roller to the tractor
Drive the tractor over the soil to compact it
Check the soil's moisture before compacting
Adjust the weight of the roller if needed
Collect manure from barns or stalls
Let the manure compost for a period
Apply the composted manure to fields
Shut off the electricity to the mill
Load equipment onto a trailer or truck
Unload the equipment at the correct spot
Secure the edges with nails or staples
Approach the milking parlor or stall
Milk the cow, pump the milk into containers
Remove the machine and clean the area
Install the new glass into the frame
Reattach the window frame to the structure
Position the chicken in the processor
Activate the processor to slaughter the chicken
Remove feathers and organs as needed

tasks.task: Regrade the soil in the pasture
subtasks: Remove debris and resize the pasture
Use a grading tool or hand tools to level the soil
Test the soil's firmness for grazing

subtasks: Mix the herbicide according to instructions
Spray the fields targeting the weeds
